item.description:
Presentation Series - Steps to Success
How to Get an Employer's Attention and Land the Job You Want - Resume, Cover Letter, Interview, and Portfolio tips

Date: April 22, 2009
Time: 6:30 PM
Location: Youngâ€™s Printing, Middletown, CT
182 Court St., Middletown, CT 06457-3357
Cost: $12 online / $15 door

The New Haven Design and Marketing Meetup invites you to attend a presentation by Richard Thomson of The Creative Group.

Join us on April 22 for tips on how to make yourself stand out from the masses. Whether you are job-hunting, self-employed, or just interested in maintaining a stellar portfolio and self-image, this will be a useful presentation and networking event for you to attend!

Wine, beer, and snacks will be served.

Please RSVP in advance!
Online - $12
Door - $15 / $6 students - Please email in advance to reserve your spot if you are not RSVP-ing on the meetup page! RSVP requests go to Cassie - c.swart85@gmail.com.
Students should bring a valid student ID and driver's license.

EVENT SPONSORS
Young's Printing
Caserta Design Company, Llc
item.name: Presentation Series - Steps to Success
